reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cutting-Edge Android 12 Tablet Ecperience
reviews.reviewText: The Newest Android 12 Tablet has proven to be an exceptional addition to my tech arsenal, earning a well-deserved 5 out of 5 stars. From its Octa-Core Processor to the thoughtful inclusion of accessories, this tablet delivers a cutting-edge experience.The speed at which it loads is impressive, making every interaction seamless and efficient. Whether launching applications, multitasking, or streaming content, the tablet's performance is consistently snappy.The 10.1-inch display with a 1920x1200 HD screen is a visual feast, presenting graphics in stunning detail. Navigating through apps, menus, and content is a pleasure, thanks to the responsive and user-friendly interface of Android 12.The robust 8000mAh battery ensures prolonged usage without the need for frequent charging, adding to the tablet's practicality. The inclusion of 5G WiFi further enhances connectivity, ensuring fast and reliable internet access for various tasks.The 21MP camera is a standout feature, capturing moments with clarity and precision. Whether snapping photos or engaging in video calls, the tablet elevates the visual experience.The comprehensive package, complete with a keyboard, Bluetooth, mouse, and case, enhances the tablet's versatility. It's not just a device; it's a complete workstation ready to adapt to diverse computing needs.In conclusion, the Newest Android 12 Tablet is a powerhouse that combines speed, graphics, and ease of navigation into a sleek and functional device. It's a joy to use, and the thoughtful inclusion of accessories adds immense value. If you're seeking a top-tier Android tablet experience, this one ticks all the boxes. A perfect 5-star rating for a tablet that truly stands out in the crowded tech landscape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price point.
reviews.reviewText: I got this tablet for about $130 on sale. It delivers performance that would be appreciable at $180 to 200... The acessory set is decent, and the keyboard is actually pretty solid. Tablet is fast, pretty responsive, and has good battery life. Excellent as a reader or media veiwer. Unit is sturdy, and does not feel "cheap". Has a decent weight to it. Screen has an odd finish, but that goes away after some use.I would advise any buyers to use a 3rd party launcher (nova, etc..), as the default "Quickstep" launcher is very, very basic and just kinda ugly. Also, for some reason, this slab doesn't like the YouTube app, but if you use NewPipe or install youtube as a webapp from the browser, it works fine.The "Dura Speed" and "Memory Expansion" options in settings do seem to increase the responsiveness of the unit somewhat.Great for someone with basic tablet needs, may not deliver gaming performance for younger or more demanding users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I must say I was questioning if I made the right choice, but I am so glad I choose this one. I had been using a Samsung tab A since 2016. Never had a android tablet but it super fast lots of storage!!! It is not overloaded with software I don't use. Perfect for me, great resolution, great case, mouse and keyboard are a sweet add on. Battery is great and charges fast. So glad I choose this one, I have had for a week, and more than happy...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Convenient and compact. I use this tablet every day. It does everything that my desktop and my laptop do, but it's much easier to travel with (around the house and out and about). I especially like the fact that it came with so many accessories at a really great price. I've not enjoyed a purchase this much in a while. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice Product.
reviews.reviewText: The Android tablet was nicely packed. I love the accessories. Mouse. keyboard. transfer cable. Protective case and pointer pen. The tablet was easy to set up and use right out of the box. Its very responsive to my touch and its a nice size screen. This tablet is expandable if I need it to be. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple but works great
reviews.reviewText: I needed an Android based tablet to connect to my cars OBDII port to read computer diagnostics on a Prius Gen 2 model. You get a better experience with an Android device than using iPhone hand held device.I wasn't prepared for what I got. It has a KEYBOARD, a MOUSE, a CASE COVER and I think a pen(?). They had me at the Cover... no guessing what to get as it had one!So far it works great. I am actually switching out the keyboard it came with to one that has a mouse track pad on it. Less things to carry and the keyboard I had already for use on my cell phone.the price was fantastic. This is my first personal Android tablet so I'm still learning. I opted to get a WiFi model because I can piggy back off my home/work internet provider hotspots throughout California. I can also use my phone's internet.As I look back on this purchase, I should have purchased two of them when they were on sale. The price I was willing to pay was great, then Amazon included a coupon price discount and made it an even better deal.Honestly, I am getting way more than the Samsung I purchased for my father. That had no cover or other peripherals, so it was way more expensive. But he likes Samsung and dad gets what he gets.I am loving this tablet. Fits in my computer bag real easy. I now have to figure out how to make it work as an additional screen for my laptop. I'm told that is possible with Mac devices... I just Google'd it and it is possible. Just wish I had my laptop with me.This is a nice new toy for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little tablet
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little tablet and I have really enjoyed using it. Hard to beat for the price and the customer service is top notch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very user friendly with lots of value.
